thread.title: Xavier Cooper sings, dances and picks Mike Pettine's Twitter handle on new 'Joe Thomas Hour'
thread.title_full: Xavier Cooper sings, dances and picks Mike Pettine's Twitter handle on new 'Joe Thomas Hour' | cleveland.com

author: Dan Labbe, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Xavier Cooper sings, dances and picks Mike Pettine's Twitter handle on new 'Joe Thomas Hour'
text:
BEREA, Ohio -- Browns offensive lineman Joe Thomas is back with "The Joe Thomas Hour: The Best 2 Minutes of Your Life." His interview subject this week: Browns rookie defensive lineman Xavier Cooper.
Cooper, who suited up for the first time on Sunday against Oakland , answers the tough questions from Thomas, including what county he's in, how it's spelled and what song he would perform at karaoke. Watch the show below:
